title: Drawing, "Waverly Oaks [Study for the watercolor, Waverly Oaks, Mrs. Thomas Card Collection", 1878
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-green wove paper
markings: Verso: Stamped in black ink, at lower left: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
signed: Signed in graphite, at lower right corner: Homer
inscribed: Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at center: Waverly Oaks.; again in black crayon, at left edge: $15 (crossed out in ink); and in graphite: no 14; $ [10 erased]
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a large oak tree with spreading branches viewed from below, at center, with a second tree in the right background of the sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Waverly Oaks [Study for the watercolor, Waverly Oaks, Mrs. Thomas Card Collection", 1878.
1878. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray-green wove paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-87.
